DOC.brief_summary: Systems for blood glucose monitoring with glucose oxidase enzyme reaction on test strips can be affected by the partial pressure of oxygen of the blood sample. In this study, we investigate the influence of different partial pressure of oxygen in blood samples on measurement results. Systems with labelled oxygen-dependency as well as systems without labelled oxygen-dependency are evaluated.
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems - Evaluation of Oxygen Dependency
DOC.criteria: 18 years of age or older male or female subjects with type 1 or type 2 diabetes or healthy subjects signed informed consent form pregnancy or lactation period severe acute illness that, in the opinion of the investigator, might pose additional risk to the subject severe chronic illness that, in the opinion of the investigator, might pose additional risk to the subject
